Topic.Title: Wrap a room link around an image?

Posts.EditableText: Just wondered if it's possible to display an image as a link to a room with no text displayed?
Posts.HTML: Just wondered if it's possible to display an image as a link to a room with no text displayed?

Simple way to do it with the textprocessor:
{command:go south:{img:test.jpeg}}
but you don't want to get the text output 'go south' when you click the image?

Posts.EditableText: The easiest way I can think of is using ShowMenu, with a script that sends you to a room based on the option chosen. I'm pretty sure that using it with a dictionary, you could put `{img:` or similar in the text to be displayed.
Posts.HTML: The easiest way I can think of is using ShowMenu, with a script that sends you to a room based on the option chosen. I'm pretty sure that using it with a dictionary, you could put {img: or similar in the text to be displayed.
